pkgmetadata.longdescription: Fuzzy Inference System Design and Optimization // Fuzzy inference systems are based on fuzzy rules, which have a good capability for managing progressive phenomenons. This package is a basic implementation of the main functions to use a Fuzzy Inference System (FIS) provided by the open source software 'FisPro' https://www.fispro.org. 'FisPro' allows to create fuzzy inference systems and to use them for reasoning purposes, especially for simulating a physical or biological system.
